meaningMnemonic: You blast your <radical>music</radical> loud so it causes a <radical>landslide</radical>, revealing the perfect soil for <kanji>farming</kanji>! Musically moved dirt is perfect for <kanji>agriculture</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: The first person to come up with this <kanji>farming</kanji> method was <reading>No</reading>stradamus (のう), the famous seer and prophecy man. He predicted humans of the future would use special "yell cubes" to "move that good earth."
